name: CSS Shadow Generator
description: This project is made with React js. You can generate code for the box-shadow property by visualizing the changes in shadow live by using the different controls available.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: It’s a retro game you can play against computer, you will be having three options to choose if you can score 10 points before computer then you win the game otherwise you lose.

name: Boat Apparel E-commerce
description: it’s a Clothing website. You can use Log in using google and sign up using email, add items to the cart, remove items from the cart, and increase the number of items.

name: To-Do List App
description: By using this app you can schedule your daily tasks.  You can create a to-do, delete a to-do and cross a task when completed. You can also sort your completed and incomplete tasks.

name: Password Generator
description: This app creates a password of variable lengths which may include numbers, uppercase letters, lowercase letters & special characters. Generated password can be copied using a button.

name: Guess My Number
description: It’s a classic game in which computer goanna choose a number between 1 to 20 and user needs to guess that number you will get 20 chance to guess it and on every guess the game will give you hint.

name: CRUD SpringBoot & React
description: It's a project in which you can add, delete, update & read the data of students from the MySQL database which is connected with this project. (Live Not available)

name: Sticky Notes App
description: It’s a browser based app , using this app you can create & delete a note. The notes created are also been stored in the local storage of the browser. Closing tab or refresh will not effect saved notes

name: Tic-Tac-Toe JavaScript
description: It’s a multiplayer game, a player can choose X or O and make move on the board. If a player wins game displays a custom winner message and from there you can start new game.
